item.title: Enhancing Common Sense in Large Language Models: Insights from a Kaggle Competition
item.description: Enhancing Common Sense in Large Language Models: Insights from a Kaggle Competition # Endowing AI with common sense, the intuitive understanding of everyday situations, remains a significant hurdle.
